course details

2 free training webinars, where:
In just two free fully fledged webinars, we teach you how to create your own WordPress site.
We show you how to properly optimize your site and make it versatile to search engines. Only the latest, relevant and valuable information!
This course explains such terms as “good indexing”, "high traffic", "stable growth of web audience", "TOP queries" and, more importantly, how to achieve all these indicators!

What optimization is and why there is a need to understand it?
